Base Form.Description: Melody's default state is extremely weak physically, but makes up for the difference in constitution and magic power

Prime Arcana.Description: Melody's Prime Arcana form before the Fall. Mildly physically stronger than her base form, and with a higher constitution.

Akashic Collapse.Description: Activated by closing the Book, this form boosts Melody's stats to their full potential. Akashic Collapse acts like a fission reaction, burning magic as quickly as it is produced, and can only be maintained for a few moments at a time.
